short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply click on any detected phone number on the webpage, and it will open a WhatsApp chat with that number

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows Nuport users to send messages directly to any mobile number on WhatsApp without the need to save the contact name. By simply clicking on any detected phone number on the webpage, it will automatically open a WhatsApp chat with that number. No contact saving is required, providing a quick and convenient way to message anyone instantly.
